result.arabic_text: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا
result.translation: 75.Yallih naqoosak woo maray woo weelot weeloysime Jannatti qarwak fayya itta qarwal galtiman Yallih taaqatal yisbireenimih sabbatah, Kaadu Yallaa kee kay malaykak konnabaa kee salaamaqle kay addal geyan.
